--- title: "Acquisition" author: "Arpita Anand Prayag" format: html editor: visual --- # Acquisition Challenges ## 1) Get some data via an API. There are millions of providers, that offer API access for free and have good documentation about how to query their service. ## Running Code ### Load libraries ::: {.cell hash='02_data_acquisition_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-1_63fd3e7de1e515d919833e8f52b3f50b'} ```{.r .cell-code} library(RSQLite) library(dplyr) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr} ``` #> #> Attaching package: 'dplyr' ``` ::: ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr} ``` #> The following objects are masked from 'package:stats': #> #> filter, lag ``` ::: ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr} ``` #> The following objects are masked from 'package:base': #> #> intersect, setdiff, setequal, union ``` ::: ```{.r .cell-code} library(httr) library(glue) library(jsonlite) library(keyring) library(rstudioapi) library(rvest) ``` ::: ### Send the GET request to the API ::: {.cell hash='02_data_acquisition_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-2_f81dd32897064097f11c987ed6f7dbbc'} ```{.r .cell-code} response <- GET("https://www.themealdb.com/api/json/v1/1/filter.php?c=Seafood") ``` ::: ### Check the status code ::: {.cell hash='02_data_acquisition_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-3_4dceeba34703ff5a8b076a53d942753a'} ```{.r .cell-code} if (response$status_code == 200) { # The request was successful # Get the response data meals_db <- response %>% .$content %>% rawToChar() %>% fromJSON() meals_db } else { # The request failed print(response$status_code) } ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` #> $meals #> strMeal #> 1 Baked salmon with fennel & tomatoes #> 2 Cajun spiced fish tacos #> 3 Escovitch Fish #> 4 Fish fofos #> 5 Fish pie #> 6 Fish Stew with Rouille #> 7 Garides Saganaki #> 8 Grilled Portuguese sardines #> 9 Honey Teriyaki Salmon #> 10 Kedgeree #> 11 Kung Po Prawns #> 12 Laksa King Prawn Noodles #> 13 Mediterranean Pasta Salad #> 14 Mee goreng mamak #> 15 Nasi lemak #> 16 Portuguese fish stew (Caldeirada de peixe) #> 17 Recheado Masala Fish #> 18 Salmon Avocado Salad #> 19 Salmon Prawn Risotto #> 20 Saltfish and Ackee #> 21 Seafood fideuà #> 22 Shrimp Chow Fun #> 23 https://www.themealdb.com/images/media/meals/g046bb1663960946.jpg 53065 #> 26 https://www.themealdb.com/images/media/meals/spswqs1511558697.jpg 52882 #> 27 https://www.themealdb.com/images/media/meals/2dsltq1560461468.jpg 52975 #> 28 https://www.themealdb.com/images/media/meals/yypwwq1511304979.jpg 52852 ``` ::: ::: ## 2) Scrape one of the competitor websites of canyon ### Set the URL of the website to scrape ::: {.cell hash='02_data_acquisition_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-4_895795d2cd1208db5709387077b57581'} ```{.r .cell-code} url <- "https://www.rosebikes.de/" ``` ::: ### Scrape the website ::: {.cell hash='02_data_acquisition_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-5_7fc226ed885c24565cda2f551ad8a2ee'} ```{.r .cell-code} html <- read_html(url) # Find the elements that contain the model names model_names <- html %>% html_nodes(".products-slider-tile__product-name") %>% html_text() # Find the elements that contain the prices prices <- html %>% html_nodes(".product-tile-price__current-value") %>% html_text() # Extract the number using regular expressions price <- gsub("[^0-9.,]", "", prices) # Remove all non-digit, non-decimal, and non-comma characters ``` ::: ### Create a data frame of the model names and prices ::: {.cell hash='02_data_acquisition_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-6_d8fe42f516e1feaff7d7a000a1383b86'} ```{.r .cell-code} database <- data.frame( Model = model_names, Price = price ) database ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} `````{=html}
````` ::: :::
